abstract: Soccer Roundup; FIFA reduces suspensions of Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini from eight years to six years; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini had their suspensions from soccer reduced from eight years to six by FIFA’s appeals body on Wednesday.

headline.main: FIFA Reduces Suspensions of Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini

snippet: Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini had their suspensions from soccer reduced from eight years to six by FIFA’s appeals body on Wednesday....
